description: Warm up with a quick and easy minestrone soup. Our fresh twist on this comforting classic is loaded with green veggies and is nutritionally approved.
keywords: Soup,Nicky,Healthier Easier,Video,Vegetable soup,Weeknight dinner,Budget,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,Oct 2021,Asparagus
name: Green Minestrone Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
2 rosemary sprigs, leaves picked, finely chopped
840g Woolworths noadded-salt cannellini beans, rinsed, drained
2 bunches asparagus, trimmed, cut diagonally into thirds
0.25 bunch continental parsley leaves, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep saucepan over medium heat. Cook onion and celery, stirring, for 4 minutes or until softened, but not coloured. Add rosemary and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add zucchini, leek, beans, stock and 6 cups water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Add pasta. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Stir in asparagus and peas, then cook for 1 minute or until tender. Serve topped with parsley.
